content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To help you navigate during your first days we've created a map, where you can find the location of the EPAM Tokyo office and the Client Office.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":261163,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/88cb1a51-0195-4cec-a88f-8f211fcb2b5e/EPAM map @ Tokyo offices - 2020_v2.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/88cb1a51-0195-4cec-a88f-8f211fcb2b5e/EPAM map @ Tokyo offices - 2020_v2.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"EPAM map @ Tokyo offices - 2020_v2.pdf\",\"name\":\"EPAM map @ Tokyo offices - 2020_v2.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"88cb1a51-0195-4cec-a88f-8f211fcb2b5e\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
